thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Ordered a coat from the United States and no online problems. Chatted with customer support about the sizing and they were responsive. The item arrived in a timely fashion and in great shape. Fortunately, the rip in the plastic bag of the mailer was not caused by anything sharp that could have damaged the coat...
